title: Rest in Pizza
description: Trouble in paradise takes on a whole new meaning…When a body is discovered.Cassandra McNeil, the new manager of the sunny Miami location of Papa Pacelli’s Pizzeria, is thrilled that now, after weeks of hard work and preparation, the restaurant is completely in her hands.A beginning that started out perfectly smoothly, turns into a nightmare when a man is found dead in the restaurant. Papa Pacelli’s has to temporarily shut down, cutting off the store’s revenue and tarnishing its reputation, due to an investigation that is pressing in on Cassandra from all sides.Now, uncertain as to whether or not she has a fighting chance of keeping her dream job, Cassandra realizes that she has to jump in and figure out who was behind the murder…before she becomes the next victim
author: Patti Benning
